casebody.data:
Wayne T. BRACKETT, Jr.
v.
Kelly J. THOMAS, Commissioner No. 146PA17 Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 28, 2017 Christopher W. Brooks, Assistant Attorney General, for Thomas, Kelly J. (Commissioner NC Division of Motor Vehicles). Joel N. Oakley, Attorney at Law, Greensboro, for Brackett, Wayne T. (Jr.)

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 9th of May 2017 by Respondent in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 28th of September 2017."

Therefore the case is docketed as of the date of this order's certification. Briefs of the respective parties shall be submitted to this Court within the times allowed and in the manner provided by Appellate Rule 15(g)(2).
